com.xceptance.xlt.ai.pre_processing

Class PreProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.ai.pre_processing.PreProcessing

  • public class PreProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
    Second part of the image transformation, the first part is FastCornersDetector, the found edges get grouped with all points which are in the radius of the given Constants.THRESHOLD Also the artifacts (in this case groups under a minimum value Constants.MINGROUPSIZE) are ignored and discarded.
    Author:
    Thomas Volkmann

      • findGroups

        private void findGroups(java.util.List<FeaturePoint> edges,
                        FastBitmap currentImage)
        Segmentation and grouping of all edges, artifacts under a specific threshold will ignored. Parameter are Constants.THRESHOLD, Constants.MINGROUPSIZE.
        Parameters:
        edges - List of FeaturePoint
        currentImage - fastBitmap of the current screenshot.
